body_html:
That sounds good thanks! I'll try to add a benchmark for this.

As to performance critical, this is more about wanting to supplement the decision to change the implementation with results. It is always nicer if an implementation is changed as it provides better performance or corrects a bug. Those are more measurable benefits :)

The folks who are the main GPU backend developers are otherwise engaged this week. If this is not blocking you, I'm going to defer until they are able to review it.

body:
That sounds good thanks! I'll try to add a benchmark for this.

As to performance critical, this is more about wanting to supplement the decision to change the implementation with results. It is always nicer if an implementation is changed as it provides better performance or corrects a bug. Those are more measurable benefits :)

The folks who are the main GPU backend developers are otherwise engaged this week. If this is not blocking you, I'm going to defer until they are able to review it.
